description: A symbol often used in relation to the religion of Judaism. Not to be confused with the Six Pointed Star With Middle Dot emoji.
apple_vendor_description: The Star of David emoji on Apple devices is a striking geometric emblem, rendered with a rich, deep blue hue and Apple's signature glossy 3D finish. Its sharp points are softened by realistic lighting and subtle gradients, giving it a tactile and substantial presence. On Apple devices, this emoji serves as a powerful and universally recognized symbol of Jewish faith, identity, and heritage.
